titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a refundable credit for the purchase of domestically manufactured automobiles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E248)

bill.summary: 2/2/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for the acquisition of domestically manufactured automobiles.
